1217600.name: Sierra Ops : Episode 3 - Unending Dusk
1217600.description:
Important note: This DLC will be merged into the base game and will be removed from the store once episode 4 is completed.

Faced once again with the sight of ships covering the skies above Mondshire, Junius and the rest of 1st fleet are put to the test as they’re pitted against the difficult task of retaking the moon. Eager to see victory, Sigil has pushed for the completion of prototypes following the lessons learned from Sierra’s creation.

With the threat of the Martians’ secret weapon looming in the background, new allies and crew members join the fight to push the Ares out of the Terra Orbital System despite clashing personalities and hidden objectives.

What is the Ares Confederacy hiding?

Will the UTV succeed?

How much longer can they keep up this momentum?

Sierra Ops Episode 3: Unending Dusk is part three of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces.

Is it even possible to end this war without losing everything?
